name: Caldari CU-1 Nexus Chip
description:
This small data chip stores the key elements of a ship's artificial intelligence system, and is used primarily for controlling the vessel's autonomous functions. This particular chip has been modified by top Kaalakiota scientists for the Caldari Navy, made to be of better quality than what is available on the open market. 
  
The CU-1 chip is designed for cruiser class vessels.
